Message.Title: USAA, if your house burns or is detroyed they have no "full payment option" (a check on the spot).
Message.Msg: They will get low bids and nickel and dime you to death. I am switching to Chubb or better run co. premiums are no higher for "full payment option."

Topic.Title: New to Options. have a question...........

Message.Msg: I agree that you should hold on to your position. GOOG trend line showing around $750 by your June 22nd OE day. There was a lot of CALL buyers that were suckered in at $910 level and now they are chasing. If GOOG should take another $40-50 dive next week, then I would recommend selling 1/2 of your position, which will go for $6-$7 a shot.

Topic.Title: Early Pump To Sell The Near The Money Calls At A Premium

Message.Msg: Now the CALL buyers are chasing and the MM are more then happy to oblige. The PUT buying is weak and the PUTS are losing their premium. I would be loading up on the under $800 June 22 and July PUTS right now,

Message.Msg: Thanks for al lthe respones and I am holding because that is what I was thinking may happen with Goog by June 22. But I am still wondering that when I bought the contracts Goog was well over 900 and now it is 875 and yet my contract went fron my puchase price of 2.33 to 1.11 now? shouldn"t they be worth about 3 bucks now or is it just the decay on a high premium?

Message.Title: Bounce
Message.Msg: Looks good for a bounce next week..nice healthy pullback to 20 day. 45 pts from the high. Outside chance we head to 840 area but I think we bounce first to 890-900.

Topic.Title: New to Options. have a question...........

Message.Msg: I am doing pretty good so far but I am not batting 100 percent. Can you say you always make money? Nobody can .

Topic.Title: New to Options. have a question...........

Message.Msg: He's not talking about batting 100 percent. He's saying your winning trades should be returning 100 to 1000% percent. Far OTM options are like swinging for the fences. Most of the time you strike out. Money is made trading near-the-money options. Research trading spread to limit out of pocket costs and/or risk.

Message.Msg: I'd hold here. There is also the pending ruling on the VRNG Patent case that GOOG Lost. Judge Jackson may make the money damage ruling within 3 weeks. It should be best guess, 500 mill maybe 1 Bill?

Message.Title: USAA insurance running a scam. If your house burns they don't pay you on the spot (full payment option). They force you to rebuild and use their low bid and then nickel and dime you to death. Switch to a full payment up front company!
Message.Msg: not the same co. 20 years ago

Topic.Title: New to Options. have a question...........

Message.Msg: There was an extra premium built in for the GOOG tech Conference. In the previous conferences GOOG was unveiling new products which caused very high volatility in the share price (like the premium before earnings). This years conference was lacking in the thrill factor, thereby the share price is slowly falling, but the premium is gone. If we get a similar week that we just went through, you will be up 200-300% on your purchase price.

Topic.Title: New to Options. have a question...........

Message.Msg: $775 is not that far out for GOOG. Volatility is very high in this stock and it can move anywhere from $50-100 in one week. With 4 weeks left until the June 22nd options expire, there is a lot of time to get those PUTS in the money.

The Nas and the Dow pulled back 40 pts each for the week and so did GOOG. Proportionately GOOG took a hit many times over the major indexes. The big drop in the market is still to come. Employment numbers will be good again and the FED will be forced to pull the rug right out of the markets feet. Also the Quarterly rebalancing coming up this Friday and we are going to see some major profit taking in GOOG. Don't hold your breath for $890-900 anytime soon.
